wikipedia_page.main: Keith Pyott (Blackheath, London, 9 March 1902 - 6 April 1968) was a British actor.He transferred from stage to screen and was a regular face in drama in the early days of television, appearing in Educated Evans, The Prisoner, Out of the Unknown, The Avengers and the Doctor Who story The Aztecs.He also appeared in over twenty feature films, including Orson Welles' Chimes at Midnight (1965).Pyott was married to the actress Sheila Raynor.
